name: Vibot
description:
Vibot made by INHA univ game dev team 2010

# Project Description:
- a defense shooting  game about the units of cells in the Nano-meter  world of bacteria 

- a player becomes a medical Nano-Bot which delivers blood cells to the event points in the heart, protecting them from the virus, parasite, bacteria and intestinal worm

플레이어가 인체 혈관 속의 의료용 나노 로봇이 되어 적혈구들을 유해바이러스로부터 보호하고 안전하게 호송하는 게임입니다.
